item.title: Rebirth
item.description: I have been working towards overcoming an addiction to porn and masturbation for more that a year. It’s time to step up and take my recovery more seriously. I have experienced some success during this time, but Iâ€™m having difficulties progressing beyond a few weeks abstinence. The purpose of this blog will be to document my progress with the aim of furthering my journey. I will make a post here at least once a week.
